installation.script:
#!/bin/bash

apt update
apt -y install curl unzip lib32gcc1 ca-certificates xvfb
cd /tmp
curl -sSL -o steamcmd.tar.gz https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/client/installer/steamcmd_linux.tar.gz

mkdir -p /mnt/server/steam
tar -xzvf steamcmd.tar.gz -C /mnt/server/steam

export WINETRICKS_RUN=mono
export HOME=/mnt/server
export AUTO_UPDATE=1
export SRCDS_APPID=1829350

cd /mnt/server/steam
chown -R root:root /mnt

./steamcmd.sh +@sSteamCmdForcePlatformType windows +login anonymous +force_install_dir /mnt/server +app_update 1829350 validate +quit

## setup 32 bit libraries
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk32
cp -v /mnt/server/steam/linux32/steamclient.so /mnt/server/.steam/sdk32/steamclient.so

## setup 64 bit libraries
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk64
cp -v /mnt/server/steam/linux64/steamclient.so /mnt/server/.steam/sdk64/steamclient.so

# The Server Configs
mkdir -p /mnt/server/save-data/Settings
cd /mnt/server/VRisingServer_Data/StreamingAssets/Settings
cp -n ServerGameSettings.json adminlist.txt banlist.txt /mnt/server/save-data/Settings
cat > /mnt/server/save-data/Settings/ServerHostSettings.json << ENDOFFILE
{
  "Name": "V Rising Server",
  "Description": "",
  "Port": 9876,
  "QueryPort": 9877,
  "MaxConnectedUsers": 40,
  "MaxConnectedAdmins": 4,
  "ServerFps": 30,
  "SaveName": "world1",
  "Password": "",
  "Secure": true,
  "ListOnSteam": true,
  "ListOnEOS": true,
  "AutoSaveCount": 50,
  "AutoSaveInterval": 600,
  "GameSettingsPreset": "",
  "AdminOnlyDebugEvents": true,
  "DisableDebugEvents": false
}
ENDOFFILE

variables.name: Description
variables.description: Short description of server purpose, rules, and the message of the day.

variables.name: QueryPort
variables.description: UDP port for Steam server list features.

variables.name: Max Connected Users
variables.description: Max number of concurrent players on the server.

variables.name: Max Connected Admins
variables.description: Max number of admins to allow connection even when the server is full.

variables.name: Password
variables.description: Set a password or leave empty.

variables.name: List On Master Server
variables.description: Set to true to list on the server list, else set to false.

variables.name: Auto Save Interval
variables.description: Interval in seconds between each autosave.

variables.name: Game Settings Preset
variables.description: Name of a GameSettings preset found in the GameSettingPresets folder.

variables.name: Admin Only Debug Events
variables.description: Admin Only Debug Events, true or false.

variables.name: Disable Debug Events
variables.description: Disable Debug Events, true or false.
